node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `container` ( `container_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `context` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `parent_container` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`container_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: container
